newsitem.title: CHINA: China opens lubricating oil spot market.
newsitem.headline: China opens lubricating oil spot market.

text.p: China has opened a spot market for trading lubricating oil in the central city of Zhengzhou, officials said on Friday.

The Zhengzhou branch of the Guangdong Development Bank and the local administration for industry and commerce have jointly set up the market in the capital of Henan province, a development bank official said by telephone.
The market, set up with a total investment of 25 million yuan ($3 million), recently began trading, the official said.
"Turnover is already very big," he said without giving any figures.
